query:
SELECT 
  at.id,
  at.name,
  at.description,
  COUNT(DISTINCT ats.id) as section_count,
  COUNT(atq.id) as question_count
FROM auditTemplates at
LEFT JOIN auditTemplateSections ats ON at.id = ats.auditTemplateId
LEFT JOIN auditTemplateQuestions atq ON ats.id = atq.auditTemplateSectionId
GROUP BY at.id, at.name, at.description
ORDER BY question_count ASC, at.name
